response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its category and I believe it can significantly benefit your business or personal needs. Given its high value to you, I propose an exclusive offer at $9,500. This price reflects not only the product's quality but also the opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
